```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

## Columnas

```{r readData}
data <- read.csv("../Datos/data.csv")
data_replay <- data[data$ReplayID==266,]
print(colnames(data_replay))
```



## Minerales

```{r Minerales}
gg <- ggplot(data_replay, aes(Frame)) +
geom_line(aes(y=Minerals, colour = as.factor(Winner))) +
geom_line(aes(y=EnemyMinerals, colour = as.factor(-Winner))) +
ggtitle("Minerales")

gg

ggplotly(gg)

```

## Minerales totales

```{r mineralesTotales}
gg <- ggplot(data_replay, aes(Frame)) +
geom_line(aes(y=TotalMinerals, colour = as.factor(Winner))) +
geom_line(aes(y=EnemyTotalMinerals, colour = as.factor(-Winner))) +
ggtitle("Minerales Totales")

gg
```
